room_title: Escape room "Buried Alive - the Curse of Octavia" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
room_description: Octaviaâ€™s spirit roams the halls of this mansion cursing the residents of Englewood. Those who enter the mansion will be cursed and shall suffer the same fate as Octavia by being buried alive. You and your team are paranormal investigators and were hired to enter the mansion to encounter Octavia and reverse the curse. You have only 1 hour to reverse the curse or suffer the fate of being buried alive.
